title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-10.24 - Test pressure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-10.24 - Test pressure

State Regulations
(a) When a hydrostatic test is applied the required test pressure shall be one and
one-half times the maximum allowable working pressure. The pressure shall be
under proper control so that in no case shall the required test pressure be
exceeded by more than two percent. (b) During a hydrostatic test of a boiler, the safety valve or valves shall be removed or each valve disk shall be held to
its seat by means of a testing clamp and not by screwing down the compression
screw upon the spring. Notes
